Class ViconPTZPoller

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.BasePoller
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.viconptz.ViconPTZPoller
All Implemented Interfaces:
CameraPoller, DevicePoller
public class ViconPTZPoller extends BasePoller implements CameraPoller
ViconPoller is a java implementation of the Vicon camera control communication protocol.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Travis Swanston
